strings.Value: "Fine, I will kill the wolf leader."
[Attack] "You will bleed, dirty scum!"
"The worg is dead. Go see for yourself."
"I've dealt with the wolf leader."
"I suppose I'll go."
"Who are you?"
"Why are you not fighting each other?"
"What did you say about wolves?"
"No, I have other matters to attend."

{n}An oversized mite approaches you. He raises his bald blue head with dignity, and his neck is decorated with taglocks and a wolf's fang pendant. To his right walks a kobold, also swelling with conceit.{/n}
{n}The leader of the hunters nods at you solemnly.{/n}
{n}The bald mite clicks his tongue, annoyed.{/n} "Why you not check? Blockhead, now we go check... wait here, I come." {n}Turning to his companion, he waves his hand.{/n}
{n}The mite squints at you.{/n} "No, we not go."
"Hooray! Great new! Mite and kobold keep live together, no threat! Good for you. Maybe you grow up big hunter, like us." {n}Saying this, he gives you a small purse.{/n}
"Peaceful mite and kobold. Hunt together. Was easy — many mite, many kobold hunt together. Now not."
"War — bad. Puddles blood, scream loud, mite and kobold dead, cold... Why fight? Dangerous, hairy wolf around." {n}The mite shakes his head helplessly.{/n}
"Welcome peace zone! Here no war, no one attack. Only maybe fat wolf lord. He want chew us, we more sly! Who kill him — big reward."
"Ward!"
{n}After a short pause, the mite pats his neighbor on the back:{/n} "But we no fool! Go and be friend. No want war! But miss Queen Bdaah — big beauty."
"Near long tree live pack wolf. Big angry, tell mite and kobold bad thing. We maybe kill him easy, but war take hunters away."
{n}The mite shrugs nonchalantly.{/n}
"Not like thisss."
"Misss beauty?" {n}The kobold scratches his head, baffled.{/n}
"Hey! Blue head and sssnake ssskin! After me!"
"Wait, what are you saying? The worg is alive! He'll... He'll eat them!"
"Wise words! I think many people, not just mites and kobolds, could learn something from these creatures!"
"Bah! Cowards!"
"Great, ha ha! Well, you're done for, creeps!"
"Bad, bad! You die now!"
